recipe.title: Apple Date Crumble
recipe.ingredients: 8 cups peeled tart apples -- sliced 2 cups dates -- chopped 2/3 cup packed brown sugar 1/2 cup all-purpose flour 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon 1/3 cup butter or margarine 1 cup chopped nuts additional apple slices -- optional
recipe.steps: Combine the apples and dates in an ungreased 13x9x2" baking dish. In a small bowl, combine sugar, flour and cinnamon; cut in butter until crumbly. Add nuts; sprinkle over apples. Bake at 375 degrees for 35-40 minutes or until the apples are tender. Serve warm. Garnish with apple slices if desired.
